name: Slingshot
r1: If a Normal Attack or Aimed Shot hits a target within 0.3s of being fired, increases DMG by 36%; otherwise, it decreases DMG by 10%.
r2: If a Normal Attack or Aimed Shot hits a target within 0.3s of being fired, increases DMG by 42%; otherwise, it decreases DMG by 10%.
r3: If a Normal Attack or Aimed Shot hits a target within 0.3s of being fired, increases DMG by 48%; otherwise, it decreases DMG by 10%.
r4: If a Normal Attack or Aimed Shot hits a target within 0.3s of being fired, increases DMG by 54%; otherwise, it decreases DMG by 10%.
r5: If a Normal Attack or Aimed Shot hits a target within 0.3s of being fired, increases DMG by 60%; otherwise, it decreases DMG by 10%.
